I can see that you're all monsters!#What do you monsters want with these poor townspeople?#What are monsters like you doing on the surface?(break)pause 200(break)pause 200(break)pause 200/emote {{ModId}}_Sasha 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Deathskull 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Bob 16 true/emote {{ModId}}_Sticky 16/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sasha "You can see our true forms?"/pause 300/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "The jig is up! You will be no different!(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "NOT IF I SPARE YOU FIRST!(break)textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "Makes sense to me."/pause 300/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 2 0 2/move {{ModId}}_Sasha 0 1 2/pause 100/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "I promise you, we don't intend to attack any humans up here.#$e#My name is Sasha."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "I'm Sticky."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "I AM DEATHSKULL."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Bob "Bob."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "And the duggy is Doug."/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Doug "*Flops back and forth.*"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "We came here because we wanted to find out if the legends are true."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "The ones about the Spirited Eve!#$b#Where you humans eat your pets!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Bob "And poison each other!"/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "AND TRANSFORM INTO MONSTERS UNHEARD OF!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/quickQuestion ...WHAT?#Transform?!#Poison?!#Eat pets?!#Do you mean 'Spirit's Eve'?(break)speak {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YOU CANNOT HIDE THIS FROM US! WE KNOW THE TRUTH!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Bob "You pass out small hardened poisons to weed out the weak who succumb to them!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Sticky "You're the reason the jack o' lanterns are going extinct!(break)speak {{ModId}}_Bob "Don't put the blame on us innocent spirits!"/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak {{ModId}}_Sasha "Whatever you have to say, we're not going home without answers.#$b#We're going to observe you humans until the Spirited Eve and find out the truth for ourselves!"/pause 200/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Deathskull "YEAH!"/pause 100/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Bob "Monsters forever!"/pause 100/textAboveHead {{ModId}}_Sticky "Don't get in our way!"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 300/end/fade
